item.title: MS Teams Channel Conversation "Backup"
item.description: We use Microsoft Teams, and probably as most, create a new team when it was first released, however have now decided to move to a new Team. This is all fine, but when we went looking for a “migration” pathway, there wasn't one. Instead we settled on making a backup/copy for historical purposes. I went searching PowerShell for cmdlets to “backup” Teams and didn't find any. I then went searching the Microsoft Graph API and found the Teams API resources.
